Description: This is a 2007 Gibson Custom Shop Les Paul Custom (as you can verify from the serial number photographed on the back of the headpiece). It is in perfect function condition and excellent cosmetic condition. The only noticeable wear is a small patch on the back of the neck -- please see the last photo for a detailed shot of this. This guitar is all original. Nothing has been replaced or modified. It features an ebony fingerboard with mother-of-pearl inlay. The instrument comes with its original custom chop case. The frets are in excellent condition and the guitar plays great! (By the way, apologies for some of the dust visible in the photos. It didn't look nearly as noticeable in real life!) If you have any additional questions or want more photos please feel free to contact me and I'll get right back to you! Thanks for looking! We are looking to sell within the USA, but if you are an international buyer ready to make a serious offer then we are willing to consider it. However, please understand that shipping will likely be expensive to safely send the instrument overseas.
Title: Gibson Les Paul Custom - 2007 - Custom Shop - Excellent Condition
Subtitle: Black Beauty - Ebony Fretboard - Original Case
ConditionDescription: Excellent cosmetic condition. Perfect functional condition. Slight wear on the back of the neck. Please see photos.
